TopicTitle: Turn off exhaust effects/reduce exhaust lag

Articles.Content: So, as much as I like the new exhaust effects for smoke coming out of the launchpad on rocket launches, when flying vtols at low level they drop my fps to about 5 and make it almost impossible to fly. I was wondering if there was a way to disable these effects, or just the part that makes them interact with the ground, so vtols become a bit more practical.

Good question. I'm never tried this before, but I believe you want to go into your CFG, and locate this module: ModuleSurfaceFX

Try removing each PREFAB\_PARTICLE and MODEL\_MULTI\_PARTICLE subsection. If you're not sure how to remove the sets properly, then just remove everything below the module name, provided you can live without the sound effects as well.

Sorry for the necro, but I suppose this thread does involve a partial solution I am also looking for.
